name: Kevin Martin
review: Food is for eating, and good food is to be enjoyed... I think food is, actually, very beautiful in itself.

name: Shirley Smith
review: It's easy to impress me. Just good friends, good food, and good laughs. I'm happy. I'm satisfied. I'm content.

name: Jessica Brown
review: Instead of going out to dinner, buy good food. In a bad economy, it's more important to make yourself feel good.

name: Asad Xiong
review: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
